title: Environmental Management
ziele:
- Students will become better aware of ecological-sustainability issues at companies in a comprehensive context
- Students will come to better understand environmental issues as an integral part of the field of management
lehrinhalte:
- Environmental conditions and the political challenges facing companies
- Integration of environmental requirements in management
- Sustainability as a business design criteria
- Business environmental impact
- Energy, entropy
- cycles of matter
- Environmental management & environmental management systems (base knowledge)
